type.name: WeatherColorQuad
type.summary: Represents a set of weather colors for each of the four parts of the day: sunrise, day, sunset and night.

property.name: Day
property.summary: Gets or sets the weather color during the day.

property.name: Night
property.summary: Gets or sets the weather color during the night.

property.name: Sunrise
property.summary: Gets or sets the weather color during the sunrise.

property.name: Sunset
property.summary: Gets or sets the weather color during the sunset.
